item.description:
In Open Season, you play as a monster - a little cruel but wishing to do things right - who has decided to take revenge on the groups of adventurers who come to disturb his peace.
After getting rid of them, you still have to decorate your living room properly.

The game takes place in 9 rounds at the end of which the points are counted. The players play one after the other in a clockwise direction.

PLAYER TURN
During his turn, the active player must follow the following steps in order:

1. Complete the market to have 5 cards face up.
2. Take a card from the market and place it on a free space on its board.
3. Triggering of any bonus actions.
Bonus actions are the 3 actions associated with the top 3 slots of the player board.
These actions are triggered when you place a card in your reserve, of the same people as that associated with one of the three actions.

If by activating a bonus action, a new card is placed in your reserve, it can trigger another bonus action.

LAYING RULES
- All slots in the top row must contain different peoples and/or face down cards.
- The two cards on either side of the "Different" symbol must be of different peoples and/or face down cards.
- All slots in the bottom row must contain different peoples and/or face down cards.

END OF THE GAME
At the end of the 9 rounds of play, the game ends. All players have completed their personal board and proceed to counting the points.

-description from publisher
